sentence: Rep. Paul Gosar has found a new home on social media where he can continue to push the boundaries of acceptable political discussion.
author: Tara Kavaler
title: Gosar defends white nationalist Nick Fuentes on social media site Gab

sentence: Controversial Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) "has found a new home" on a far-right social media platform, The Arizona Republic reported Tuesday.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Republican Paul Gosar defends notorious white nationalist: report

sentence: In addition to Rogers, who is expected to be censured by the Arizona State Senate, Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) appeared at AFPAC.
author: Jackson Richman
title: Arizona Republican Posted Anti-Semitic Photoshop Before Speaking at White Nationalist Event
